guide.introduction: Don't let the name put you off! This project is simple and easy to do using components that you might just have lying around in your parts bin. It uses a flex sensor to detect letters, and an operational amplifier to give a signal.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Don't let the name put you off! This project is simple and easy to do using components that you might just have lying around in your parts bin. It uses a flex sensor to detect letters, and an operational amplifier to give a signal.

Relevant parts
  • Flex Sensor 2.2"
  • NPN Transistor
